name: Sun & Claw
description:
When your family is robbed by the Devil's Claw Gang, you travel to the town of Sunflower Valley - and find some unlikely allies for the adventure of a lifetime. A VN made for the Spooktober Jam with one route and two endings (currently!)

Trigger Warnings: Mentions of Murder, Minor Violence

Credits:

Writing - AFNarratives

Character Art - Bkomei

Programming - Speck

Background Art - MellBerri / https://unsplash.com/
